snippet.title: RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025
snippet.description:
RAIDOU Remastered: The Mystery of the Soulless Army is coming to Nintendo Switch on June 19, 2025! Pre-order today: https://www.nintendo.com/en-ca/store/products/raidou-remastered-the-mystery-of-the-soulless-army-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=A1013-01&utm_id=A1013-01

The beloved supernatural action RPG from ATLUS returns! Experience the story of Raidou Kuzunoha XIV, apprentice detective and Devil Summoner. Undertake the case of the century and uncover the secrets of the Soulless Army with the aid of your demons.

With revamped visuals, quality of life updates, new voiceover, and an overhauled battle system, an exciting and unexpected journey awaits both veterans and newcomers alike.

#RAIDOU #NintendoDirect #NintendoSwitch

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
